name: Apollo's Aim
description:
You are Apollo, the Greek god of music and archery. You're sworn enemy, Python, has put together a plan of treachery to remove your power as a god, and bring you down. You must fight his followers as you strive to stay powerful.

Credits:

Cody Taylor

Andrew Ptaszek 

Melanie Najera

Will Huges

This game was made in under 72 hours for the Polytechnic Respawn Game Jam.
